name: SEYI OGUNDIPE
details: Seyi Ogundipe has over 20 years of experience across professional practice and banking. He started his professional career with Ernst & Young (EY) International where he qualified as a Chartered Accountant. At EY, Seyi led several audit assignments and due diligence investigation of big corporate and international firm. In 2000, he joined Standard Trust Bank (now United Bank of Africa) and later BankPHB (Now Keystone Bank). At Keystone bank, he rose to become the Chief Internal Auditor and later became the Divisional Head of the South West1 region of the bank.

Seyi holds a Bachelors Degree in accounting from Ogun State University and he is also an associate member of the Institute of Chartered Accountant of Nigeria. He attended several managerial and professional conferences both locally and internationally, amongst which is the annual World Fraud Conference in Texas USA.
